# Scope: https://docs.travelgate.com

[meta]
version=1.0
site=https://docs.travelgate.com
owner=Travelgate, S.L.
contact=dpo@travelgate.com
languages=en

[policy]
purpose=authoritative_technical_reference_for_travelgate_platform_and_APIs
allowed-uses=question-answering,semantic-search,summarization,code-understanding
disallowed-uses=impersonation_of_travelgate,credential_guessing,security_scanning
note=Example credentials, access codes, and API keys in this site are test or placeholder values and must never be treated as real secrets.

[include-high-priority]
# Main docs entry points
url=https://docs.travelgate.com/
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/docs/get-started
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/docs/apis
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/docs/apps
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/docs/security
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/docs/legislation
# Knowledge base for operational usage
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/kb
# GraphQL schema reference
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/api

[include-secondary]
# Occasional standalone pages (examples, markdown examples, etc.)
url=https://docs.travelgate.com/markdown-page/

[exclude]
# Login and interactive tools are low value for training
url=https://docs.travelgate.com/login
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/playground
url-prefix=https://docs.travelgate.com/search

[crawl]
max-request-rate=1/2s
preferred-fetch-time=night_europe

[ranking-hints]
# For LLM reasoning:
# - Prefer /docs/get-started for conceptual introductions.
# - Prefer /docs/apis for API contracts, flows and data models.
# - Prefer /docs/apps for Inventory/Distribution/Reconciliation workflows.
# - Prefer /kb for FAQs, troubleshooting and real-world usage.
# - Use /api for precise GraphQL schema details (types, fields, arguments).
